name: Name
hide_album_message: Hiding this album will create a .nomedia file in the folder; this could make the media inaccessible from other apps. Use the exclude option to avoid this.
delete_album_message: Are you sure you want to delete this album?
delete_albums_message: Are you sure you want to delete all the selected albums?
delete_photo_message: Are you sure you want to delete this media?
delete_photos_message: Are you sure you want to delete all the selected media?
hide_albums_message: Are you sure you want to hide the selected albums?
unhide_album_message: Unhiding this album will also make the media available for other apps.
new_folder_message: The new folder will be created in the current path, and the media will then be copied or moved in the new folder.
restart_app: NOTE: Restart the app for the changes to take effect.
affix_save_here_sub: The result will be saved in this album
affix_error: Can't affix video; you must select at least 2 images.
security_sub: Set up a password to protect your media.
remember_password_message: Note: Password changed. If you forget it, you will have to clear the application data.
auto_update_media_sub: You should disable this if there are a large number of images.
traslucent_statusbar_sub: Apply a darker primary color to the notification bar.
option_show_tips_sub: Helps you to understand the use of some features.
disable_animations_sub: Disable animations if there are performance issues.
enable_timeline_desc: Enable the Timeline view for media. Experimental.
custom_3thAct_sub: Customize theme transparency on media viewer.
max_brightness_sub: Use maximum brightness when viewing media
picture_orientation_sub: Rotate even when auto rotate is locked
apply_theme_sub: Apply custom color on the picture viewer
load_full_image_when_zoom_in: Load full image when zoomed in
media_viewer_swipe_direction_sub: Change swipe direction of the media viewer (Default: Left to Right)
video_instant_play_sub: Allows you to instantly play the video, skipping the preview.
primary_color_sub: The main color to be used in the UI.
accent_color_sub: The secondary color is used to tint widgets and UI details.
colored_navbar_sub: Apply the primary color to the navigation bar.
about_license_sub: Check GPLv3 license terms used on LeafPic Revived.
about_library_license_sub: Check third-party libs used on LeafPic Revived.
send_mail_error: There are no email clients installed.
fingerprint_instruction: Place your fingertip on the Home button to verify your identity.
about_support_translate_sub: Help us translate LeafPic Revived in more languages.
about_support_report_bug_sub: Report bug or request new features.
about_support_rate_sub: Leave us a positive rating if you like LeafPic Revived.
about_support_github_sub: Fork the repo and push changes or submit new issues.
error_drm_not_supported: Protected content is supported on Android 4.3 and later
error_drm_unsupported_scheme: This device does not support the required DRM scheme
storage_permission_denied:
Permission to access storage was denied!
 We're not able to get your images!
sd_card_permissions_message:
In the next screen, please select the root of the SD
card in the left sidebar and confirm at the bottom to grant the writing permission of
the SD card.
got_permission_wr_sdcard: Obtained permission to write on the SD-Card.
use_media_store_sub:
If you miss some folders or if you have any issue
with the albums, enable this option.
multi_column_sub: Choose how many columns you want for your folders and media.
sub_scaling_image_view_sub: (TESTING) It allows you to have a better zoom management and a clear image but it isn't really optimized right now.
error_contact_developer: Something went wrong, please contact the developer.
use_primary_color_in_the_viewer: Use primary color in the viewer
exclude_albums_message:
Are you sure you want to exclude the selected
albums?
If you want to exclude the parent of these albums, keep in mind that a dropdown exists
to allow you to select the parent of the folder.
exclude_album_message:
By excluding this folder you will also exclude all sub-folders. Below you can find a list
that allows you to choose a parent, if you have to exclude more folders which are on the same level.
manage_your_folders_sub: Here can handle the excluded folders and include folders that don't show up
white_list_explaination:
You can add folders that are not listed or folders with some media missing.
White-listed folders will be scanned periodically when the device is in idle mode, so it won't cause any performance issues.
error_occured_open_media: An error occurred while opening this media.
error_thumbnail: Unable to find a thumbnail for the album.
no_app_to_perform: Unable to find an app to perform this action.
waring_share_multiple_file_types: There may be problems sharing multiple file types.
